participant_1.background:
My family accepts me as I am, even with my red hair and my history of working for Monsanto.
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.
My family works in various fields, but we all have a passion for life.
I live in California, where I am pursuing my dream of becoming a fashion designer.
I like to make clothes in my favorite color, blue.

participant_2.background:
I would brag about my violin skills to my friends if I was famous.
I enjoy working out and staying active, even though my work life is boring.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
I'd brag about my ability to stay humble and grounded even when I'm on top of the world.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well, thank you. How are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking!
That is good to hear! What are you up to today?
I am currently working on designing a new dress.
Oh wow! That sounds like fun! What kind of dress are you designing?
It is a blue dress with a floral pattern.
That sounds beautiful! I love blue!
Thank you! I am glad you like it.
What is your favorite part of designing clothes?
I love being able to create something new and unique.
That is a great quality to have! I am sure you will be very successful in your career.
Thank you for the encouragement! I appreciate it.
You are welcome! What is your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I enjoy spending time with my family and friends.
That is great! I am sure they are lucky to have you.
Thank you! I am lucky to have them too.
